rukus.text: Sonohi ware ga jigoku ni,`man'in ni natta ka.' To tou to,`nao oku no (hairu)-sha ga orimasu ka.' To kotaeru
Omo o osoreru mono ni wa, rakuen ga chikadzuite kuru. Sugu chikaku ni
Kore wa kaigo shite tsuneni (arra ni) kaeri (omo no okite o) mamoru subete no mono no tame ni yakusoku sa rete ita monodeari
menimienai jihibukaki okata o osore, kokoronosokokara kaigo shite (omoni) kaetta-sha-tachi no tame (no monodearu)
Yasu njite sore ni ire. Kore wa eien no hidearu
Kare-ra no tame ni wa soko ni, hoshimono wa nandemoari, mata waga moto kara motto tsuika ga arou

Ware wa kare-ra izen ni, ikaga ni oku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra wa, korera (makka no tashinkyo to) yori mo chikara ni oite motto yumodeattade wanai ka. Sore de kare-ra wa sho toshi o meguri aruitaga, doko ni hinansho ga arou ka
Hontoni kono nakaniha kokoro aru mono, mata mimiwokatamukeru-sha, chushi suru mono e no kyokun ga aru
Ware wa ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o 6-nichi no ma ni sozo shita. Shikashi ware wa sukoshi no tsukare mo kanjiru koto wa nakatta
Sorede anata wa kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi,-nushi no eiko o home tatae nasai. Taiyo ga noboru mae to shizumu mae ni
Mata yoru mo, kare o tataete 唱念 Shi nasai, mata reihai no owari ni mo
Mimi o katamuke nasai. Shoshu-sha ga sugu chikai tokoro kara yobu hi ni (sonaete)
Sonohi, kare-ra wa shinjitsu no hitokoe o kikou. Sore wa (hakaba kara) deteiku-bidearu
Hontoni ware wa nama o sazuke, mata shi o ataeru. Ware ni (subete no mono no) kichaku-sho ga aru
Sonohi, daichi wa kare-ra (no tokoro) kara sake, kare-ra wa isoide deteiku. Kore koso ga shoshu de, ware ni totte wa yoina godearu
Ware wa kare-ra no iu koto o yoku shochi shite iru. Anata wa kare-ra ni kyosei shite wa naranai. Waga keikoku o osoreru-sha-tachi ni, kuruan ni yotte kunkai shi nasai
